title: Ziggs Poro plushie? This'll be a blast! - handmade Poro plush with his Ziggs outfit!
body:
***Who doesn't love Poro?
Everyone loves them!***

http://imgur.com/ubgzZHa

One cute little Poro decided that he wants to cosplay someone! So he asked me for help.

***"What costume you want me to make?"
"I want to cosplay Ziggs! Because he is so cool and funny!"***

So yesterday I've made costume for my little buddy!

http://i.imgur.com/AQgBIff.jpg

He was so happy about his new costume that he wanted to share his joy with **Mr.Cupcake** but he was looking just like **Ziggs** so **Mr.Cupcake** was a bit scared!

http://i.imgur.com/raD7L0G.jpg

Only Jinx was not scared of him because **Jinx loves** boombs, explosions and **Ziggs**! Now she even loves Poro's!

http://i.imgur.com/39fusPL.jpg

***Come on! Does this look dangerous to you?* **
Ziggs Poro plush I made is dangerous and sweet :D
https://www.facebook.com/PoroAdoptionCenter

replies.body:
This is really awesome! I love the detail in the goggles, especially!

moar poro cosplays pls
Thank you so much! Next one is Braum's Poro from his Dragonslayer skin :D
When did Jinx start a poro adoption center? She doesn't strike me as the..."motherly/matronly" type.

Who said that Jinx is running it? :P I'm running it :) 
Ziggs was visiting her :P
I am a man's man, rugged, disciplined, confident in my masculinity.  Having said that, I freaking want one of these!  They are so cute, I could die! :-D
Some of those tongues didn't look like tongues at first...
